verbs.description: DALLAS - The auditorium at the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center , where the 147th NRA convention [V: is] headquartered , holds about 10,000 seats . There are none available for today 's Leadership Forum , where President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence are scheduled to speak .
